snippet: A victim of alleged sexual abuse by a Roman Catholic priest at a summer camp testified in a Philadelphia court that church officials took more than 10 years to resolve his complaint.
abstract: Walter J Daly, victim of alleged sexual abuse by Roman Catholic priest Rev John Cannon, testifies in a Philadelphia court that church officials took more than 10 years to resolve his complaint; his testimony comes during the landmark trial of Msgr William J Lynn, being tried on charges he endangered children by placing priests in positions where they were able to molest them.
lead_paragraph: A victim of alleged sexual abuse by a Roman Catholic priest at a summer camp testified in a Philadelphia court that church officials took more than 10 years to resolve his complaint.

headline.seo: Philadelphia Archdiocese Put Off Abuse Complaints, Jurors Told
headline.main: Jurors Told That Church Put Off Abuse Complaints
headline.print_headline: Jurors Told That Church Put Off Abuse Complaints
